data.description:
【Own An Island Here】
MageCosmos is an open world where your adventures are unlimited. Your incredible journey starts on a magical floating island with your own cozy house on it, like everybody else. Looking around, you will find neighbors living on the same island as you do. This is a HUGE world!

【Farm&Factory, Keep It Running】
Your life on the island depends pretty much on how you manage it. You have a big farm to grow various plants, feed animals, use your harvest to manufacture new items, and complete orders requested over the community to get huge amounts of MageCoins in return while having fun! 

【Friends With Neighbors, Even Not With Real Human】
Speaking of that, friends are important or it'll be so lonely in such a big world, shake hands with whoever you meet to become friends with and send gifts to them. You can also use a small rocket, fly around and explore the islands. Some AI live there and they're desperate to meet visitors, ask them anything you want!

【Mini-Games And Worlds】
As is implied in the name "Cosmos", we are creating diverse styles of worlds to travel across, and party games for you and your friends to play together...It's going to be fun!

changelog.change_log:
MageCosmos is a popular virtual space to hangout with friends and play free games together. Join our discord to keep yourself updated ! 

Version 0.4.2 Update Information

【Update】: 
New game "The Commando" is now online! Defeat other player with missile launcher, grenede, cannon and other weapons to get higher points, get ready for tournament ! 

【Bug Fixed】: 
1. In "The Party" game, hunter can't finish the game by catching the escaper.
2. In "The Archer" game, arrows don't cause damage sometimes.
3. In "The Birdman"game, the record board display can be incorrect sometimes.
